description: This file provides prototype declarations for external API functions of the Ansc CoVer3 Object, including creation, removal, initialization, and engine task spawning methods. It serves as a header interface defining how external components can interact with the CoVer3 module.

methods.name: AnscCoVer3Create
methods.description: Creates an instance of the Ansc CoVer3 Object with specified context handles.

methods.name: AnscCoVer3Remove
methods.description: Removes and cleans up the specified Ansc CoVer3 Object instance.

methods.name: AnscCoVer3EnrollObjects
methods.description: Enrolls or registers necessary objects for the CoVer3 module.

methods.name: AnscCoVer3Shutdown
methods.description: Shuts down the CoVer3 Object instance.

methods.name: AnscCoVer3SpawnTask
methods.description: Creates and starts a new task/thread with specified entry point and name.

methods.name: AnscCoVer3SpawnTask2
methods.description: Creates and starts a new task/thread with specified entry point, name, and priority.

methods.name: AnscCoVer3SpawnTask3
methods.description: Creates and starts a new task/thread with specified entry point, name, priority, and stack size.

methods.name: AnscCoVer3EngineTask
methods.description: Executes the main engine task associated with the CoVer3 module.
